lyrics:
29 contributorsthank you lyricsintro malcolm kelley
yo this one right here
is for all the drop outofschoolers
the future cougars
the mary jane abusers
the ones that chose to be losers
for all the misfit kids and the total outcasts
mkto this ones for you
role models

chorus tony oller
we are the ones
the ones you left behind
dont tell us how
tell us how to live our lives
ten million strong
were breaking all the rules
thank you for nothing
cause theres nothing left to lose

verse 1 tony oller
thank you for feeding us years of lies
thank you for the wars you left us to fight
thank you for the world you ruined overnight
but well be fine yeah well be fine
you might also likeverse 2 malcolm kelley
thank you for the world you broke
like yolk and it aint no joke
so cold and there aint no coat
just me my friends my folks and
we gonna do what we like
so raise that bird up high
and when they ask you why
just stand there laugh and smile

chorus tony oller
we are the ones
the ones you left behind
dont tell us how
tell us how to live our lives
ten million strong
were breaking all the rules
thank you for nothing
cause theres nothing left to lose

na na na na
na na na na na na
na na na na
na na na na na na
verse 3 tony oller  malcolm kelley
thank you for the times you said dont make a sound
thanks for the ropes you used to hold us down
cause when i break through ima use them to reach the clouds
we aint comin down we aint comin down cmon

verse 4 malcolm kelley
look ma i finally made it
this world is too damn jaded
my life is just like vegas
go big go home get faded
been a prob since 92
cant shut me down curfew
and them girls ill take a few
do what i wanna do

chorus tony oller
we are the ones
the ones you left behind
dont tell us how
tell us how to live our lives
ten million strong
were breaking all the rules
thank you for nothing
cause theres nothing left to lose

na na na na

na na na na
na na na na na na

thank you from the bottom of my heart
from head to toe from the soul you ripped apart
i say thank you i say thank you
yeah thank you
thank you thank you yeah yeah

break chant tony oller
we are the ones
the ones you left behind thank you
dont tell us how thank you
tell us how to live our lives heyyyyeah
ten million strong

cause theres nothing left to lose woo

outro malcolm kelley
yo if you dont like what they tell you to do
dont do it
if you dont want to be who they want you to be
screw it its your world
its your life and they ruined it
role models
